data.title: Absolute best pizza!!
data.text: My husband and I are new to the area and have been looking for the past eight months or so for good pizza. We've tried various pizza establishments but none have ever kept us coming back repeatedly. Our neighbor and I have been having conversations and exchanging reviews of pizza places that we have ate at in the past. She told me about Old Town Pizza and asked if I had ever had their pizza. She also mentioned that a new location was opening up in Roseville. We made a date for both of our families to have dinner one Friday evening back in the summer, and this has become a traditional Friday night dinner location for my family. I can't express how delicious they are pizza it is. The crest, the sauce, the toppings are absolutely mouthwatering and keeps you coming back for more. The rotating beer options is just the icing on the cake! They have found customers for life in us.

data.title: You'll be lickin' yer chops!
data.text: Excellent pizza at this newish establishment in Old Town Roseville. A great craft beer selection and yummy pizza, served crispy and tasty. We always order The Conductor, a meat lovers delight! No delivery as yet, but I am assured it is coming. One of the better pizza joints in Roseville! Enjoy.

owner_response.author: Russell Y, Owner at Old Town Pizza, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for your review Sean! Just wanted to let you and other know that we have had delivery for the last 2-3 weeks. We are currently delivering daily from 4pm-Close. Cheers!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Excellent
data.text: The pizza crust was one of the best I have ever had! The sampler platter was good also. A lot of beer selections.

data.title: Old Town Pizza - Roseville
data.text: We visited Old Town Pizza in Roseville for dinner last week because we had driven by the building several times and it looked so cute we had to try the place out.  It was very charming and inviting inside too, and the staff and the pizza we had were awesome!  It will be a regular dining experience for us!

data.title: Best pizza
data.text:
I pretty tuff when it come to pizza as I have owned my own. I hate franchise pizza crap.

This was amazing the service is slow they need more staff .. They were nice but to slow. 

Pizza sauce was excellent I will be back the meat pizza was good forgot what they call it the place is Hugh

data.title: Before the Beer
data.text: The first time we were at the new Roseville location they did not have their liquor license yet so there were no handles on the beer taps. they are however voluminous and have since been added.We really enjoyed the pizza and really like the feel of the restaurant. Having the pickup window at the front door was a good idea as well. We think it is a great addition to the downtown Roseville area.

data.title: Best Pizza in Town
data.text: This is the best pizza in Roseville and the surrounding areas. The pizza is delicious. The beer selection is fantastic. We also ordered caprese and dinner salads and both were very fresh and excellent. Service was great too. I love that fact that a server took our order and we didn't order at a counter like many local pizza places. It is located in downtown Roseville. There is plenty of space and lots of tables- great for team events or large groups. This is our new favorite!

data.title: Fantastic Happy Hour!
data.text: My boyfriend and I stopped in on a Friday night and we were pleasantly surprised at the bill!  We shared a small marguerite pizza, wings, and had 2 beers.  The pizza was incredible, and I could have definitely eaten more!  The wings were large, but, a bit in the fatty side.  Jeff the beer tender was awesome!

data.title: Excellent!
data.text: This new location is just as great as the Lincoln location, although this one has much more space. It is the best pizza around and the employees are great!

data.title: Great food, great atmosphere!
data.text: This was a great family friendly restaurant! Good food, a lot of options to choose from! Great staff!
